stock-trader.description: A full-stack real-time stock trading platform featuring live market data streaming, portfolio management dashboard, and automated trading bots. The responsive React-based UI and optimized NestJS backend architecture ensure a seamless user experience. Integration with Claude AI contributed to the architecture design.

space-fighters.description: A real-time multiplayer space combat game developed with Phaser and React, offering fast-paced gameplay, dynamic visuals, and interactive user experiences. Players can compete in engaging battles, customize their ships, and track their progress through a modern, responsive interface powered by a robust NestJS backend. Claude AI was used to help build the architecture.
